thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Circles

title: Circles
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Here we were at "Cidade São Paulo Shopping" giving lunch to our son when I note the roof of the food court. It have many big circles and small light spots and to me it gives a nice graphical effects. Installed on number 1230 of Avenida Paulista, the Cidade São Paulo Shopping was inaugurated on April 30, 2015. Designed and built by Cyrela Commercial Properties, has gross leasable area of 17 thousand square meters, with five floors, 160 shops and major brands retail. In the entertainment area, offers theater and cinema. In gastronomy, it brings some of the most prestigious restaurants in São Paulo, among them, Andiamo, Almanara and Outback. There are 1500 parking spaces and a range of services such as bicycle parking with 150 spaces. In addition to all the infrastructure, the visitor can enjoy a open air garden of 2400 m², with native trees, tables, benches and free entry. Located near the MASP and Trianon Park, it is easily accessible by bus and subway. Its innovative architectural design has the certify LEED Gold, which certifies compliance to strict requirements regarding the environment and sustainable occupation. 
Nobody has marked this note useful
